name: Solstice eUSX
description: Solstice's eUSX is the liquid staking token (LST) which USX holders receive when locking their USX into the protocol. It represents both their underlying USX holdings and the yield generated through a leading dynamic delta-neutral trading strategy. The deployed trading strategies include funding rate arbitrage, hedged staking and tokenized treasury allocation to capture consistent returns while minimizing market risk. Solstice's strategies are deployed across major centralized exchanges, secured with leading custody providers and supported by independent pricing and proof-of-reserve infrastructure.
